sapphireFue.title: Sapphire FUE
sapphireFue.description: Advanced follicular unit extraction using precision sapphire blades

dhi.description: Direct hair implantation for natural-looking results

procedureTime.question: How long does the procedure take?
procedureTime.answer: The procedure typically takes 6-8 hours, depending on the number of grafts needed.

resultsTime.question: When will I see results?
resultsTime.answer: Initial results are visible after 3-4 months, with full results appearing after 12-18 months.
